comments.body: What about calling this `Combined`? I.e., that would imply we are running different types of services. On a side note: regardless, just an indexer doesn't make a participant yet.

comments.body: In line with the above recommendation on the key for the `participant` parameter you may want to call this `ParticipantRunMode` or `ParticipantServerMode` instead.
